channel.title: Reconnect thing
channel.description: I have sometimes problem with my connection to the internet, and when it go off lets say my game freezes. The thing is, its not a bug or anything that will exit my game naturally. So, after force exit while in game, i cant reconnect. I dont want to ,gamethrow' by it. So maybe a good thing would be to add one time recconect button (available for 2 min) after exiting while in game?

item.title: Reconnect thing
item.dc:creator: Okowoko
item.description:
I have sometimes problem with my connection to the internet, and when it go off lets say my game freezes. The thing is, its not a bug or anything that will exit my game naturally. So, after force exit while in game, i cant reconnect. I dont want to ,gamethrowâ€™ by it. So maybe a good thing would be to add one time recconect button (available for 2 min) after exiting while in game?
